title: Petition to bring back the dancing Katarina animation when you purchase something in the shop!
body: We still have the old Commando Galio when the store session expires so why can't we have that? = )

replies.body: I second this rito pls do it or else I'll afk from life {{champion:55}}
For the nostalgia ? Sure why not

Add my vote to this too :D

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
